name: Radish Veggie Soup
effect:
Restores 8–10% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 210–300 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.

suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The vegetables within appear to have been victims of a frost.

normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.

delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The clear aromas are perfectly accompanied by a sunny summer afternoon.
